nbteditor.outdated.title: NBT Editor Outdated
nbteditor.outdated.desc: A new update has been released!
nbteditor.incompatible_protocol.title: Incompatible NBT Editor Protocol
nbteditor.requires_server: §cThis requires NBT Editor to be installed on the server (and you must have level 2 OP)!
nbteditor.no_ref.unknown: §cFailed to find what you're trying to edit!
nbteditor.no_ref.to_edit: §cYou must be holding an item or looking at a block/entity to edit!
nbteditor.no_ref.to_edit_nbt: §cYou must be holding an item or looking at a block-entity/entity to edit!
nbteditor.no_ref.to_export: §cYou must be holding an item or looking at a block/entity to export!
nbteditor.no_ref.to_export_item: §cYou must be looking at a block/entity to export to an item!
nbteditor.no_ref.container: §cYou must be holding or looking at a container!
nbteditor.no_ref.skull: §cYou must be holding or looking at a player head to edit!
nbteditor.no_ref.attributes: §cYou must be holding an item or looking at a mob to edit!
nbteditor.no_ref.block: §cYou must be holding or looking at a block to edit!
nbteditor.no_ref.book: §cYou must be holding or looking at a lectern with a written book to edit!
nbteditor.no_ref.signboard: §cYou must be holding or looking at a sign to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.to_edit: §cYou must be holding an item to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.to_view: §cYou must be holding an item to view!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.to_export: §cYou must be holding an item to export!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.skull: §cYou must be holding a player head to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.block: §cYou must be holding a block to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.book: §cYou must be holding a written book to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.no_item.signboard: §cYou must be holding a sign to edit!
nbteditor.no_hand.all_item: §cYou must be holding an empty slot to edit a new item!
nbteditor.editor.name: Name
nbteditor.editor.unsaved.title: Subject Not Saved!
nbteditor.editor.unsaved.desc: You haven't saved the subject. Save changes?
nbteditor.nbt.empty_key.title: Unsupported NBT!
nbteditor.nbt.empty_key.desc: This nbt editor doesn't support nbt with an empty string ("") as a key. Remove that key-value pair?
nbteditor.nbt.overwrite.title: That tag already exists!
nbteditor.nbt.overwrite.desc: Do you want to overwrite it?
nbteditor.nbt.saving_air.title: Data Loss!
nbteditor.nbt.saving_air.desc: You are saving air, which loses its NBT data. Continue?
You are saving invalid component(s), which will be deleted. Continue?
nbteditor.nbt.marker.unsafe:
The value cannot be converted to NBT
and will be reverted when unselected
nbteditor.nbt.marker.invalid_component:
This component is invalid
and will be deleted when saved
nbteditor.nbt.export.item.error: §cThe subject cannot be converted into an item
nbteditor.nbt.import.desc_3: Drag files to import onto this screen
nbteditor.nbt.import.desc_5: .nbt files from /nbt export will give/place/summon the subject
nbteditor.nbt.import.desc_6: Images will create a painting with the image being the lore
nbteditor.nbt.import.desc_8: You can also drag files onto the esc menu or your inventory
nbteditor.nbt.import.data_version.desc:
For .nbt files without a DataVersion
tag, this is used instead
You can also input Minecraft versions
This is used to update files
nbteditor.nbt.import.data_version.unknow: §6DataVersion was missing from §r%s§6, so the current version of Minecraft was assumed (use [run_command]{/nbt import}([show_text]{Click to execute}(§c/nbt import)) to specify a data version)
nbteditor.nbt.import.data_version.new: §cThe file §r%s§c is from a newer version of Minecraft, and it is not possible to downgrade it!
nbteditor.file_options.delete.title: %s
nbteditor.file_options.delete.desc: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This cannot be undone!
nbteditor.client_chest.corrupt_warning: §cSome page(s) appear to be corrupt and have been backed up separately.
nbteditor.client_chest.name_not_found: There isn't any page with that name!
nbteditor.client_chest.clear_page.title: Are you sure?
nbteditor.client_chest.clear_page.desc: This will permanently delete all 54 items in this page!
nbteditor.client_chest.data_version.unkn: Page #%s is from an unknown version of Minecraft! Import/Update?
nbteditor.client_chest.data_version.old: Page #%s is from an older version of Minecraft (%s)! Update?
nbteditor.client_chest.data_version.new: Page #%s is from a newer version of Minecraft (%s)!
nbteditor.client_chest.data_version.impo:
Sets the current page's
DataVersion to the current
Minecraft version

For all pages without a
DataVersion tag, this
sets it to the current
Minecraft version
nbteditor.client_chest.data_version.upda:
Updates the current page,
assuming the page is from the
data version inputted above
(If a DataVersion tag existed,
the input would be ignored)

Updates the current page,
ignoring the data version
input above
(If the DataVersion tag didn't
exist, the input would be used)

Updates all outdated pages,
skipping any without a
DataVersion tag if a data
version isn't supplied above
Updating pages into 1.20.5 or 1.20.6 may cause data loss due to a Minecraft bug! Continue?
§aSuccessfully imported/updated page #%s§a! The old page was backed up just in case:
§aSuccessfully imported/updated all pages! The old pages were backed up just in case:
nbteditor.book.convert.formatting_saved: That book contains formatting, which isn't supported by writable books. You have received a copy instead.
nbteditor.container.title: Nbt Editor >>
nbteditor.sign.new.missing_arg: §cYou must supply the new signature! /sign edit <new signature>
nbteditor.sign.save_error: §cThere was an error saving your signature!
nbteditor.sign.load_error: §cThere was an error loading the signature, restart game
nbteditor.get.lost_item.history_hint: §aUse [run_command]{/get lostitem history}([show_text]{Click to execute}(§6/get lostitem history)) to view recent cursor contents
nbteditor.unbind_skull.no_textures: §cThat head hasn't loaded any textures yet!
nbteditor.block_states.none: There are no block states for this block!
nbteditor.attributes.slot.head: Head
nbteditor.attributes.new_uuids.no_attrib: §cThere are no attributes on this subject!
nbteditor.enchantments.tip: You can Ctrl+Click enchanted books onto items in supported inventories
nbteditor.max_stack_size.invalid_state: §cItems can't be both stackable and damageable!
nbteditor.book.title: Title
nbteditor.book.author: Author
nbteditor.book.preview.click.title: §lClick Event Triggered
nbteditor.signboard.glowing.desc: Use shift to open color selector
nbteditor.config.shortcuts.desc:
Create command shortcuts like calling
/lore instead of /factory display lore
nbteditor.config.enchant_level_max.desc:
Toggle showing the maximum enchantment
level after the enchantment
nbteditor.config.enchant_number_type.des:
Display enchantments with a
specific number system
nbteditor.config.key_text_size.desc:
How large the text is in the
nbt editor's key list
nbteditor.config.chat_limit.desc:
Extend the chat limit for
client-side commands
nbteditor.config.single_quotes.desc:
Allow surrounding keys and
values with single quotes
(in opened strings)

Can cause problems with text
Can make the nbt shorter
nbteditor.config.single_quotes.example:
Allowed: "{§e'§rkey with quote -> §e\§r" <-§e'§r:0}"
Not Allowed: '{§e"§rkey with quote -> §e\\§r" <-§e"§r:0}'
nbteditor.config.scroll_speed.desc:
Increase/decrease the speed
of scrolling in NBT Editor menus
nbteditor.config.air_editable.desc:
Allow working with air in the nbt editor menu

§eThis is an experimental feature!
nbteditor.config.json_text.desc:
Use JSON for text instead of the
custom text format
Use /get help textformat
for more info
nbteditor.config.check_updates.desc:
Whether or not NBT Editor updates
should be shown at game startup.
Use this to disable the notification.
nbteditor.config.check_updates.minor.des:
Display large updates, which
include many new features
nbteditor.config.check_updates.patch.des:
Display small updates, which include
bug fixes and single features
nbteditor.config.client_chest_size.desc:
Increase the page limit from 100 to unlimited
This can cause freezing when scrolling
through lots of pages
This MAY not increase memory usage
nbteditor.config.screenshot_options.desc:
Add the buttons %s §rand %s
§rto the screenshot message
nbteditor.config.tooltip_overflow_fix.de:
Prevent tooltips from exiting the screen
If required, this will scale down tooltips
nbteditor.config.no_slot_restrictions.de:
Allows you to put non-armor
items into armor slots, shulker
boxes into shulker boxes, etc.
This also allows you to remove
curse of binding items

Some things require NBT Editor
to be installed on the server
and OP
nbteditor.config.hide_format_buttons.des:
Hide all of the formats accessible via
keybind in the formatted text editors

This may allow the color dropdown
to expand out when there wasn't
previously room
nbteditor.config.special_numbers.desc:
Allow entering §6NaN§cd§r, §6Infinity§cf§r, §6-Infinity§cd§r, etc.
into the nbt editor
This is not consistent with /data (MC-200070)
nbteditor.config.aliases.desc:
Create command aliases like calling
/f instead of /factory
nbteditor.config.aliases.example: Example: "nbteditor export | x" creates the alias "/nbteditor x"
nbteditor.config.aliases.extreme.desc:
Add the default "extreme" aliases,
most being a single character long
§oFor the most dedicated NBT Editor users
nbteditor.config.item_size.desc:
Display the item size in bytes, kb, etc.
on the tooltip
nbteditor.config.page_keybinds.desc:
Whether Page Up increases the page number (Normal)
or goes to the previous page (Inverted)
nbteditor.config.trigger_block_updates.d:
Disable block updates when modifying blocks,
allowing you to create unstable states

§eThis is an experimental feature!
nbteditor.config.warn_incompatible_proto:
Whether or not a warning should
appear if the server and client have
incompatible versions of NBT Editor
nbteditor.config.enchant_glint_fix.desc:
Enchanted block entity items don't
show a glint due to MC-69683
nbteditor.config.recreate_blocks_and_ent:
When removing some NBT tags,
it may not actually get removed
due to MC-128225, since the
block/entity doesn't actively clear
its data when the tag is missing.
Enabling this causes the block/entity
to be completely replaced/respawned
rather than edited, which has other
side effects
nbteditor.config.creative_tabs_pos.desc:
Move the client chest & ender
chest tabs to different areas
of the screen
nbteditor.fancy_text_arg_type.stringify_: §cThis text contains hover events or formatting that can't be fully recreated
nbteditor.chat_length_warning_1: WARNING: The text will be truncated to
nbteditor.help_3: §6/nbt [new <item> | export <format> | import | config]: §7Edit, export, or import the NBT of something, or open the config
nbteditor.help_5: §6/open [echest]: §7Open the container you're holding, looking at, or your enderchest, with no item restrictions
nbteditor.help_6: §6/get <item | block | entity | potion | soup | skull | hdb | preset | lostitem | help | credits> [<args>]: §7Get an item, place a block, spawn an entity, or get information
nbteditor.help_7: §6/factory <attributes | blockstates | book | display | enchantments | max | signature | signboard | unbindskull | unbreakable | unstackable> [<args>]: §7Utilities for enchantments, attributes, etc.
nbteditor.help_9: §7NBT Editor must be installed on the server for OPed players to be able to access some features. This includes editing items in survival mode, editing blocks, editing entities, and opening your enderchest.
nbteditor.help_11: [FORMAT] §7Help on a specific feature: §b/get help <[run_command]{/get help nbteditor}([show_text]{Click to execute}(nbteditor)) | [run_command]{/get help clientchest}([show_text]{Click to execute}(clientchest)) | [run_command]{/get help open}([show_text]{Click to execute}(open)) | [run_command]{/get help get}([show_text]{Click to execute}(get)) | [run_command]{/get help factories}([show_text]{Click to execute}(factories)) | [run_command]{/get help textformat}([show_text]{Click to execute}(textformat))>
nbteditor.help.nbt_3: §7Edit item/block/entity nbt, as well as the type and (for items) count.
nbteditor.help.nbt_4: §7In the field with the subjects's name, you can rename like an anvil.
nbteditor.help.nbt_5: §7When a value doesn't match the list's type (for example putting an integer into a string list), it will be highlighted yellow. It will not save.
nbteditor.help.nbt_6: §7To change the type of something, you can use the same syntax as /data:
nbteditor.help.nbt_7: §a"Str"§7 for text, §61§cb§7 for byte, §65.8§cd§7 for double, §63§7 for integer, §f{}§7 for compound, etc.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_3: §7The client chest exists on all servers and in singleplayer.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_4: §7It automatically saves when a change is made. While saving, an asterisk (*) will appear after the title.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_5: §7You can have up to 100 pages in its default mode, but can be changed to unlimited in the config.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_6: §7The << and >> buttons jump to the previous/next page with items on it, or the first/last page if none is found.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_7: §7Locking the slots prevents the removing of items in the chest, and is forced on when you can't edit your inventory to prevent item loss.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_8: §7Reloading reloads the page from the file.
nbteditor.help.client_chest_9: §7Clear page deletes everything on that page, and cannot be undone. There is a confirm dialog in case of a misclick.
nbteditor.help.open_3: §7This opens containers in your inventory or the world, as well as your enderchest.
nbteditor.help.open_5: §7Any item can be put into any slot, regardless of typical restrictions.
nbteditor.help.open_6: §7Normal containers like chests, hoppers, and furnaces use the slots at the beginning of the gui, which map directly to the container's slots.
nbteditor.help.open_7: §7Special containers assign meaning to each slot: (in order of the slots in the gui)
nbteditor.help.open_13: §7 - Most Spawn Eggs & Entities: head, chest, legs, feet, main hand, off hand
nbteditor.help.open_14: §7 - Horse/Donkey/etc. Spawn Eggs & Entities: saddle, armor/carpet, chest contents (all only if applicable)
nbteditor.help.get_5: §6block [<pos>] <block>: §7Get a block item or set a block (like /setblock)
nbteditor.help.get_6: §6entity <entity> [<pos>] [<nbt>]: §7Get a spawn egg or summon an entity (like /summon)
nbteditor.help.get_7: §6potion (normal | splash | lingering) <effects>: §7Get a potion with specific effects
nbteditor.help.get_8: §6soup <effect> [<duration>]: §7Get a suspicious stew with the specific effect
nbteditor.help.get_9: §6skull <username>: §7Get the player head for a player
nbteditor.help.get_10: §6hdb [<args>]: §7Access the Minecraft Heads database via a port of the plugin HeadDB by UnlimitedNinjas
nbteditor.help.get_13: §6help [nbteditor | clientchest | open | get | factories | textformat]: §7Get help, including for specific features
nbteditor.help.factories_4: §6attributes: §7Edit attribute modifiers (for items) and attribute bases (for entities)
nbteditor.help.factories_7: §6display [name | lore | hideflags] [<args>]: §7Edit names, lore, and hideflags
nbteditor.help.factories_11: §6randomuuid [add | remove]: §7Add a random UUID to an item
nbteditor.help.factories_12: §6signature (add | remove | edit <new signature>): §7Add a signature to items
nbteditor.help.factories_14: §6unbindskull: §7Remove a skull's link to the original owner
nbteditor.help.text_format_3: §7Used instead of JSON for formatted text
nbteditor.help.text_format_4: §7Can be toggled back to JSON in §6/nbteditor config
nbteditor.help.text_format_5: [FORMAT] §7Formatting uses \& for [run_command]{/get preset colorcodes}([show_text]{/get preset colorcodes}(§9§ncolor codes)) and supports custom colors (\&#RRGGBB;)
nbteditor.help.text_format_6: §7When changing colors, the format is not cleared; use &r
nbteditor.help.text_format_10: §7The §6[show_item]§7 event's value uses a slot id, and will default to the held item
nbteditor.help.text_format_11: §7The §6[show_entity]§7 event's value uses a uuid, and will default to the targeted entity, or finally yourself
nbteditor.credits_2: §6I hope you enjoy! Don't mess with §otoo§r§6 many §c[Admin] §6ranks :D
nbteditor.credits_6: §7Ported to client sided Fabric by mega12345mega
